title: bhakti paravashattAl
sahitya:
bhakti paravashattil pAvanamAvOm paramAnandamE peruvOm


anupallavi

  shuddha mukta nitya satya samarasan mEl


caraNam 1    harihara mahAdEva allA parama pitA murugA sadguruvenrE urugi manam kuvinda
    caraNam 2    nAma rUpam kaDanda jnAnap-param jyOtiyai �Om tatsat Om� enra uNmai mantiram Odi
